New Records: Dawid Malan scored his fourth World Cup hundred
Reece Topley made his World Cup debut
Key Match Events: Dawid Malan and Jonny Bairstow formed a century stand
Pre-Game Insights: England responded to their previous defeat
Dawid Malan was in impressive form
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh were fined for slow over rate
England's confidence returned after the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's chase became challenging due to high asking rate
England's total was the second highest in the tournament
Others: The match was part of the World Cup 2023-24
Dawid Malan became the oldest Englishman with a World Cup hundred
